biblio.service

Interface BiblioService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BiblioServiceImpl

    public interface BiblioService

    Contains methods to find, save, update and delete Biblio data

    It is part of the data service layer
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mohammed Binhamed
